items.title: Dark offcanvas
items.description: Change the appearance of offcanvases with utilities to better match them to different contexts like dark navbars. Here we add .text-bg-dark to the .offcanvas and .btn-close-white to .btn-close for proper styling with a dark offcanvas. If you have dropdowns within, consider also adding .dropdown-menu-dark to .dropdown-menu.
items.code:
